You can use apps like Google Home or integrate with services such as IFTTT to send messages from your phones to the screen. For simplicity, consider the 'Digital Frame' apps or even a dedicated device like the Skylight Frame, which supports custom messages. Mount it securely on the wall, connect to Wi-Fi, and set up shared access via family accounts. If you need step-by-step setup, I can guide you.

Pair it with the "Digital Family Frame" apps or services like Skylight's messaging feature (if your calendar model supports it) or the free "Marco Polo" app for video/text notes from family phones. For simple text reminders, enable Google Home integration via IFTTT to push notifications from a shared Google Calendar. Keep it simple: Set up one family-shared account, auto-rotate to power-saving mode, and use large fonts—total setup time under an hour, with no ongoing maintenance needed beyond occasional charging.
